settings.commandToExecute: [concat('bash ', parameters('installChefServerScriptName'), ' -u ', parameters('chefsrvAdminUsername'), ' -p ', parameters('chefsrvAdminPassword'), ' -i ', parameters('chefsrvNicIPAddress'), ' -d ', parameters('adDomainNameFQDN'), ' -h ', parameters('chefsrvName'), ' -o ', parameters('chefOrganization'))]

[concat('powershell -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -File ', parameters('chefwinwksCustomConfigsScriptName'), ' -ChefServer ', parameters('chefsrvName'), ' -ChefUsername ', parameters('chefsrvAdminUsername'), ' -ChefOrg ', parameters('chefOrganization'), ' -ADUsername ', parameters('addcAdminUsername'), ' -ADPassword ', parameters('addcAdminPassword'),' -ADDomain ', parameters('adDomainNameFQDN'))]
